item.title: Quick Start Guide with create-react-app (TypeScript + Eslint + Prettier)
item.description: Why use create-react-app Originally I was using a manually written webpack script to build my react project. The reason was to reduce the length of package-lock.json. But as I’m diving deeper into the frontend ecosystem, it doesn’t look like a good choice to wait for frontend guys fixing the dependency hell. So instead of waiting for a neat solution, I need to find a quick solution. As part of the lessons I learned from handwriting webpack scripts, it’s hard to build a complete and reusable scaffold to build a React.
